collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines our
practices regarding the use of certain permissions and functionalities while
emphasizing our commitment to not collecting or storing any of your data.

To this end, the
ONX RP Alerts Extension does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data
or browsing history.

All functionalities are designed to operate without the
need to gather or store any user information externally.

Data Security**

As the Extension does not collect or store any personal data, there are no
risks of data breaches or unauthorized access to personal information.

Your
privacy and security are inherently preserved through our no-data-collection
policy.
